Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 56th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1972...
Injured on 5/15/1975 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Lynchburg on 11/3/1976...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 11/3/1976 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1977, off Curtis Sparks (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1977, off Michael Patnaude (GHG)...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 2/5/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $3,250,000 per year...
